class Queue {
  constructor() {
    this.arr = [];
  }

  enqueue(value) {
    this.arr.push(value);
  }

  dequeue() {
    return this.arr.shift();
  }

  length() {
    return this.arr.length;
  }

  peek() {
    return this.arr[0];
  }

  isEmpty() {
    return this.arr.length === 0;
  }

  clear() {
    this.arr = [];
  }
}

const queue = new Queue();

// ë°ì´í„° ì‚½ì…

queue.enqueue(20); // arr: [1, 20]

// í˜„ì¬ í ê¸¸ì´

class Stack () {
  constructor () {
    this.arr = []
  }

  push (value) {
    this.arr.push(value)
  }

  pop () {
    return this.arr.pop()
  }

  length () {
    return this.arr.length
  }

  peek () {
    return this.arr[this.arr.length - 1]
  }

  isEmpty () {
    return this.arr.length === 0
  }

  clear () {
    this.arr = []
  }
}

function solution(A, K) {

function solution(A, K) {

function solution(A, K) {
  const length = A.length;
  let result = [];

  for (let i = 0; i < length; i++) {
    const target = (i + K) % length;
    result[target] = A[i];
  }

  return result;
}

N = 32 ì´ë¼ë©´, 100000 ì´ë¯€ë¡œ 1ë¡œ ê°ì‹¸ì§„ ìˆ˜ê°€ ì—†ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— 0ì„ ë°˜í™˜í•´ì•¼í•œë‹¤.

í’€ì´

 2
 3

 5
 6

 8
 9
10
11
12
13
14
15

function solution(N) {
  const binary = N.toString(2);
  const zeroArray = binary.split("1");
  let result = 0;

  for (let i = 0; i < zeroArray.length; i++) {
    const prev = zeroArray[i - 1] !== undefined;
    const next = zeroArray[i + 1] !== undefined;
    const current = zeroArray[i].indexOf("0") > -1;
    if (prev && current && next) {
      const thisLength = zeroArray[i].length;
      result = thisLength > result ? thisLength : result;
    }
  }

  return result;
}

ì²˜ìŒ í’€ì€ ë°©ë²•ì´ë‹¤. ì¼ë‹¨ ì´ì§„ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë³€í™˜í•œ ë‹¤ìŒ, 1ë¡œ ìŠ¤í”Œë¦¿í•˜ê³  ì´ì „, ë‹¤ìŒ, í˜„ì¬ ìš”ì†Œë¥¼ ê°ê° ë¹„êµí•˜ì—¬ í’€ì—ˆë‹¤.

function solution(N) {
  const binary = N.toString(2);
  const gap = binary.substr(0, binary.lastIndexOf("1") + 1);
  const zeroArray = gap.split("1");

  let result = 0;
  for (let i = 0; i < zeroArray.length; i++) {
    result = Math.max(result, zeroArray[i].length);
  }

  // ì´ë ‡ê²Œë„ ê°€ëŠ¥
  // result = Math.max.apply(null, zeroArray.map(item => item.length));

  return result;
}

function solution(clothes) {
  let answer = 1;
  let obj = {};

  for (let i = 0; i < clothes.length; i++) {
    // ì˜·ì˜ ì¢…ë¥˜ë³„ë¡œ ì…ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ê°¯ìˆ˜ ì¹´ìš´íŠ¸
    // ì´ˆê¸°ê°’ì€ 1, ì•ˆ ì…ì—ˆì„ ê²½ìš°ë„ ìƒê°í•´ì•¼ í•¨
    obj[clothes[i][1]] = (obj[clothes[i][1]] || 1) + 1;
  }

  const objArray = Object.keys(obj);
  for (let j = 0; j < objArray.length; j++) {
    answer *= obj[objArray[j]];
  }

  // ì „ë¶€ë‹¤ ì•ˆ ì…ì—ˆì„ ê²½ìš° 1ì„ ë¹¼ì¤Œ
  return answer - 1;
}

function solution(priorities, location) {
  var answer = 0;

  var arr = priorities.map((item, index) => ({
    target: index === location, // ì¸ì‡„ ìš”ì²­í•œ ë¬¸ì„œ
    value: item, // ì¤‘ìš”ë„
  }));

  while (true) {
    // í˜„ì¬ ì¸ì‡„í•  ì°¨ë¡€ì¸ ë¬¸ì„œë¥¼ ëŒ€ê¸°ëª©ë¡ì—ì„œ ì œê±°
    const front = arr.shift();

    // ëŒ€ê¸°ëª©ë¡ì¤‘ì— í˜„ì¬ ì¸ì‡„í•  ë¬¸ì„œë³´ë‹¤ ì¤‘ìš”ë„ê°€ ë†’ì€ ë¬¸ì„œê°€ ìˆë‹¤ë©´
    if (arr.some((item) => item.value > front.value)) {
      // í˜„ì¬ ë¬¸ì„œë¥¼ ì œì¼ ë’¤ë¡œ ë³´ëƒ„
      arr.push(front);
      continue;
    }

    // íšŸìˆ˜ ì¦ê°€
    answer++;

    // í˜„ì¬ ì¸ì‡„í•  ë¬¸ì„œê°€ ë‚´ê°€ ìš”ì²­í•œ ë¬¸ì„œê°€ ë§ë‹¤ë©´
    if (front.target) {
      return answer;
    }
    // else
    // ìš”ì²­í•˜ì§€ ì•Šì€ ë¬¸ì„œëŠ” ì¤‘ìš”ë„ì— ë”°ë¼ íšŸìˆ˜ ì¦ê°€ í›„ ê·¸ëƒ¥ ë„˜ê¹€
  }
}

function solution(heights) {
  let heightsLength = heights.length;
  let answer = Array(heightsLength).fill(0);

  for (let i = heightsLength - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    for (let j = i - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
      if (heights[j] > heights[i]) {
        answer[i] = j + 1;
        break;
      }
    }
  }

  return answer;
}

function solution(heights) {
  return heights.map((v, i) => {
    while (i) {
      i--;
      if (heights[i] > v) {
        return i + 1;
      }
    }
    return 0;
  });
}

function solution(participant, completion) {
  participant = participant.sort();
  completion = completion.sort();

  for (let i = 0; i < participant.length; i++) {
    if (participant[i] !== completion[i]) {
      return participant[i];
    }
  }
}

function solution(numbers) {
  var sortNumbers = numbers.sort(sorted);
  var answer = "";

  for (var i = 0; i < sortNumbers.length; i++) {
    if (answer === "0") {
      continue;
    }

    answer += sortNumbers[i];
  }

  return answer;
}

function sorted(a, b) {
  var caseA = "" + a + b;
  var caseB = "" + b + a;

  if (caseA > caseB) {
    return -1;
  }
  return 1;
}

function solution(array, commands) {
  var answer = [];
  commands.forEach((ijk) => {
    let arr = array.slice(ijk[0] - 1, ijk[1]).sort((a, b) => a - b);
    answer.push(arr[ijk[2] - 1]);
  });
  return answer;
}

function solution(d, budget) {
  var answer = 0;

  var depts = d.sort((a, b) => a - b);
  var deptsLength = depts.length;

  for (let i = 0; i < deptsLength; i++) {
    budget -= depts[i];

    if (budget < 0) {
      return answer;
    }

    answer++;
  }

  return answer;
}

  // ìŠ¤í…Œì´ì§€ ë°˜ë³µ
  for (let i = 1; i <= N; i++) {
    // í˜„ì¬ ìŠ¤í…Œì´ì§€ì— ë„ë‹¬í–ˆìœ¼ë‚˜ í´ë¦¬ì–´í•˜ì§€ ëª»í•œ ì‚¬ëŒ
    let currentStagePlayer = stages.filter((stage) => stage === i).length;
    // í˜„ì¬ ìŠ¤í…Œì´ì§€ë¥¼ ë„ë‹¬í•œ ì‚¬ëŒ
    let overStagePlayer = stages.filter((stage) => stage >= i).length;

    answer.push({
      stage: i, // ìŠ¤í…Œì´ì§€
      fail: overStagePlayer ? currentStagePlayer / overStagePlayer : 0, // ì‹¤íŒ¨ìœ¨
    });
  }

  answer = answer
    .sort((a, b) => {
      // ì‹¤íŒ¨ìœ¨ì´ ê°™ë‹¤ë©´, ìŠ¤í…Œì´ì§€ ì˜¤ë¦„ì°¨ìˆœ ì •ë ¬
      if (a.fail === b.fail) {
        return a.stage - b.stage;
      }
      // ì‹¤íŒ¨ìœ¨ ë‚´ë¦¼ì°¨ìˆœ ì •ë ¬
      return b.fail - a.fail;
    })
    .map((item) => item.stage);

  return answer;
}

function solution(arr) {
  if (arr.length <= 1) {
    return [-1];
  }

  var min = Math.min(...arr);
  var index = arr.indexOf(min);
  arr.splice(index, 1);

  return arr;
}

function solution(num) {
  let cnt = 0;

  while (true) {
    // ìˆ«ìê°€ 1ì´ë˜ë©´ ì¢…ë£Œ
    if (num === 1) {
      return cnt;
    }
    // ì‘ì—…ì„ 500ë²ˆ ì´ìƒ ë°˜ë³µí–ˆìœ¼ë©´ ì¢…ë£Œ
    if (cnt >= 500) {
      return -1;
    }

    if (num % 2 === 0) {
      num /= 2;
    } else {
      num = num * 3 + 1;
    }
    cnt++;
  }
}

function solution(x) {
  var sum = 0;
  var num = x;
  while (num > 0) {
    sum += num % 10;
    num = parseInt(num / 10);
  }

  return x % sum === 0;
}

function solution(arr1, arr2) {

function solution(x, n) {

function solution(n, m) {
  var answer = [];

  answer[0] = gcd(n, m);
  answer[1] = (n * m) / answer[0];

  return answer;
}

function gcd(a, b) {
  if (a < b) {
    [a, b] = [b, a];
  }

  if (a % b === 0) {
    return b;
  }
  return gcd(b, a % b);
}

function solution(s, n) {
  var answer = s
    .split("")
    .map((item) => {
      if (item === " ") {
        return item;
      }

      var charCode = item.charCodeAt();
      var result = charCode + n;

      if ((charCode <= 90 && result > 90) || (charCode >= 97 && result > 122)) {
        result -= 26;
      }

      return String.fromCharCode(result);
    })
    .join("");

  return answer;
}

function solution(n) {

  return answer;
}

function solution(s) {
  return s
    .split(" ")
    .map((word) => {
      return word
        .split("")
        .map((char, index) => {
          return index % 2 === 0 ? char.toUpperCase() : char.toLowerCase();
        })
        .join("");
    })
    .join(" ");
}

function solution(strings, n) {
  var answer = strings.sort((a, b) => {
    if (a[n] === b[n]) {
      return a.localeCompare(b);
    }

    return a[n].localeCompare(b[n]);
  });

  return answer;
}

function solution(arr, divisor) {
  var divisorArray = arr.filter((item) => item % divisor === 0);

  if (divisorArray.length > 0) {
    return divisorArray.sort((a, b) => a - b);

  return [-1];
}

function solution(a, b) {
  var start = a > b ? b : a;
  var end = a > b ? a : b;

  return ((start + end) * (end - start + 1)) / 2;
}

function solution(n) {
  // trueì¸ ê°’ì€ ì†Œìˆ˜ë¼ê³  ê°€ì •, 0ë²ˆ indexë¥¼ ì •ìˆ˜ 0ì´ë¼ê³  ìƒê°í•˜ê³  í’€ê¸° ìœ„í•´ n + 1ê°œ ë§Œí¼ ë°°ì—´ ìƒì„±
  let arr = Array(n + 1).fill(true);

  for (let i = 2; i ** 2 <= n; i++) {
    if (arr[i]) {
      // í•´ë‹¹ ìˆ˜ì˜ ë°°ìˆ˜ëŠ” ëª¨ë‘ ì†Œìˆ˜ê°€ ì•„ë‹˜ìœ¼ë¡œ false ì²˜ë¦¬
      for (let j = i ** 2; j <= n; j += i) {
        arr[j] = false;
      }
    }
  }

  // 0ê³¼ 1ì€ ì œì™¸
  arr = arr.slice(2).filter((item) => item);

  return arr.length;
}

// javascript

function solution(n, lost, reserve) {
  // ìˆ˜ì—…ì´ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í•™ìƒ = ì „ì²´í•™ìƒìˆ˜ - ìƒì–´ë²„ë¦° í•™ìƒ
  let answer = n - lost.length;

  for (let i = 0; i < lost.length; i++) {
    for (let j = 0; j < reserve.length; j++) {
      // ìƒì–´ë²„ë¦° ì‚¬ëŒì´ ì—¬ë¶„ì„ ê°–ê³  ìˆëŠ” ê²½ìš°
      if (lost[i] === reserve[j]) {
        // ê°ê° ë°°ì—´ì—ì„œ ì œì™¸
        lost.splice(i, 1);
        reserve.splice(j, 1);
        // ìˆ˜ì—… ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í•™ìƒ ìˆ˜ ì¦ê°€
        answer++;
        // ë°°ì—´ì„ ì‚­ì œí•´ì¤¬ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ë¡œì§ì„ ê²€ì¦ì—†ì´ ë„˜ì–´ê°€ëŠ” indexê°€ ìˆì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ ië¥¼ ë¹¼ì¤Œ
        i--;
        break;
      }
    }
  }

  for (let i = 0; i < lost.length; i++) {
    for (let j = 0; j < reserve.length; j++) {
      // ìƒì–´ë²„ë¦° í•™ìƒì˜ ì•, ë’·ë²ˆí˜¸ì˜ í•™ìƒì´ ì—¬ë¶„ì„ ê°–ê³  ìˆë‹¤ë©´
      if (lost[i] - 1 === reserve[j] || lost[i] + 1 === reserve[j]) {
        // ê°ê° ë°°ì—´ì—ì„œ ì œì™¸
        lost.splice(i, 1);
        reserve.splice(j, 1);
        // ìˆ˜ì—… ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í•™ìƒ ìˆ˜ ì¦ê°€
        answer++;
        // ë°°ì—´ì„ ì‚­ì œí•´ì¤¬ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ê²€ì¦ì—†ì´ ë„˜ì–´ê°€ëŠ” indexê°€ ìˆì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ ië¥¼ ë¹¼ì¤Œ
        i--;
        break;
      }
    }
  }

  return answer;
}

ìœ„ ì²˜ëŸ¼ ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ í’€ì—ˆëŠ”ë°, ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì‚¬ëŒë“¤ì˜ í’€ì´ë¥¼ ë³´ê³  ë°˜ì„±í•˜ê²Œ ëë‹¤. ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì‚¬ëŒì˜ í’€ì´ ì¤‘ ê°€ì¥ ì§§ì€ í’€ì´ì™€, ë‚´ê°€ ë³´ê¸°ì— ê°€ì¥ ì´í•´ê°€ ì‰¬ìš´ í’€ì´ë¥¼ ì²¨ë¶€í•´ë³¸ë‹¤. ì°¸ê³ í•˜ë©´ì„œ ê³µë¶€ë¥¼ ë§ì´ í•´ì•¼ê² ë‹¤.

function solution(n, lost, reserve) {
  return (
    n -
    lost.filter((a) => {
      const b = reserve.find((r) => Math.abs(r - a) <= 1);
      if (!b) return true;
      reserve = reserve.filter((r) => r !== b);
    }).length
  );
}

function solution(n, lost, reserve) {
  var answer = new Array(n).fill(1);

  lost.forEach((val) => answer[val - 1]--);
  reserve.forEach((val) => answer[val - 1]++);

  for (let i = 0; i < answer.length; i++) {
    var clothLength = answer[i];

    if (clothLength === 2) {
      if (answer[i + 1] === 0 || answer[i - 1] === 0) {
        answer[i]--;
        answer[i + (answer[i + 1] === 0 ? 1 : -1)]++;
      }
    }
  }

  return answer.filter((x) => x >= 1).length;
}

// javascript

function solution(answers) {
  var answer = [];

  var a = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5];
  var b = [2, 1, 2, 3, 2, 4, 2, 5];
  var c = [3, 3, 1, 1, 2, 2, 4, 4, 5, 5];

  var ans = [0, 0, 0];
  answers.forEach((item, index) => {
    if (item === parseInt(a[index % 5])) ans[0]++;
    if (item === parseInt(b[index % 8])) ans[1]++;
    if (item === parseInt(c[index % 10])) ans[2]++;
  });

  var max = Math.max.apply(null, ans);

  ans.forEach((item, index) => {
    if (item === max) {
      answer.push(index + 1);
    }
  });

  return answer;
}

// javascript

function solution(dartResult) {
  var result = Array(3).fill("");
  var index = 0;

  dartResult.split("").forEach((char) => {
    if (isNaN(char)) {
      if (result[index]) {
        index++;
      }

      switch (char) {
        case "S":
          result[index - 1] = result[index - 1] ** 1;
          break;
        case "D":
          result[index - 1] = result[index - 1] ** 2;
          break;
        case "T":
          result[index - 1] = result[index - 1] ** 3;
          break;
        case "*":
          result[index - 2] *= 2;
          result[index - 1] *= 2;
          break;
        case "#":
          result[index - 1] *= -1;
          break;
      }
    } else {
      result[index] += char;
    }
  });

  return result.reduce((a, c) => a + c);
}

// javascript

function solution(n, arr1, arr2) {
  var answer = arr1.map((item, index) => {
    var bitOr = item | arr2[index];
    var binary = bitOr.toString(2);

    return binary.replace(/1/g, "#").replace(/0/g, " ");
  });

}

// javascript

function solution(n, arr1, arr2) {
  var answer = arr1.map((item, index) => {
    var bitOr = item | arr2[index];
    var binary = bitOr.toString(2);

    if (binary.length < n) {
      binary = "0".repeat(n - binary.length) + binary;
    }

    return binary.replace(/1/g, "#").replace(/0/g, " ");
  });
  return answer;
}
